itemDescription: eighth Bishop of Yukon and acting Metropolitan of British Columbia

wikipedia_page.main:
John Timothy Frame (8 December 1930 – August 4, 2017) 
was the eighth Bishop of Yukon and acting Metropolitan of British Columbia.Frame was educated at the University of Toronto and ordained in 1957. He was at Burns Lake Mission, Caledonia until his ordination to the episcopate in 1968. In 1973 he became Metropolitan of British Columbia, resigning in 1980. From then, until his retirement in 1995, he was the Rector of Christ Church Cathedral, Victoria and Dean of Columbia.
